}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The device is equipped with either a 2dBi ([http://www.encore-usa.com/al/product/ENUWI-1X42 ENUWI-1X42]), 3dBi (ENUWI-1X43), or 5dBi ([http://www.encore-usa.com/al/product/ENUWI-1X45 ENUWI-1X45]) antenna. There is no difference between units except for the antenna.
==Links of Interest== [http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2011/05/21/%23ubuntu-co.txt USB ID (lsusb) mention]
